page.title: 13Going for a picnic
page.content: I like to go to{Pitsford Reservoir} for a picnic with my Mum and Dad and my two sisters, Helen and Anna.We travel in Dad's{Ford Sierra}car from our home in Northampton.There are lots of open spaces where you can run about and woods where you can hide and play games. We sit on top of a small hill from where you can look down across the reservoir. I like watching the fishermen and the people sailing boats while we eat our tea. We take{cheese {and pickle}and{chicken}sandwiches, bags of potato{crisps}and some{orange {squash}to drink. Nearby is a black tunnel that carries water from one lake to another. When the water level is low, and the tunnel is empty, we think it's fun to crawl through on our tummies to the other side. It's only just wide enough for me and my sisters to get through.
